content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of lab entity with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67} and status EntityStatus.NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5), chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=1.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors due to lack of coal in inventory
 -  Ensure there is coal in the inventory before attempting to use it
### Errors due to no input liquid in steam engine
 -  Ensure there is input liquid in the steam engine before attempting to use it
### Errors due to no fluid present in connections
 -  Ensure there is fluid present in the connections before attempting to use it
### Errors due to out of fuel in burner mining drill
 -  Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors due to out of fuel in boiler
 -  Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors due to no ingredients to smelt in furnace
 -  Ensure there are ingredients to smelt in the furnace before attempting to use it
